newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch shares regain ground near the close.
newsitem.headline: Dutch shares regain ground near the close.

text.p: Dutch shares regained ground near the close to end at the day's high, but dealers said trade was thin. The AEX share index added 0.68 points to 593.11.
Royal Dutch was the main outperformer throughout the day, rising 3.20 guilders to 294.30. Dealers said there was more to come after today's record close for the oil giant.
Shell Oil in the U.S. which posted record third quarter net income boosted the stock, but dealers said there was also support from a strong demand for Royal Dutch call options.
Philips dipped further ahead of the firm's third quarter results on Thursday, shedding 0.30 to 59.00 guilders.
